name: SHUBHAARAMBH NAGAR

idea:
Pagoni Infosolution Pvt. Ltd. (Pagoni Infosolution) a Mumbai based bootstrap IT startup into creating and developing Smart IT Solutions for Education sector. Company has build ERP software called “EduBigg” Class management software with a latest technology for educational institutions and coaching classes to manage students and their teaching system and helps to monitor the key performance indicators online. Our solution helps educational institutions in minimizing the administrative work and could focus on there academic work, also reduces the cost of staff and helps to increase admissions.

Pagoni Infosolution also working for building Educational base Software’s / Platforms e.g. Test Paper Preparer (EduTest), School/Colleges (BiggBoard) administrative ERP software, ELearning Platform, Private Tutor Platform, Co-Work/ Library (Class room Rental) Platform, etc. and in the next phase intend to create a market place for Indian Colleges, Institutions and Coaching centres wherein students may find all information about colleges and their course curriculum, course fees, admission session, reviews, etc. at one place. with affordable price.

Company founded by Kshemendra Surendra Gupte with co-founder Jaiprakash Yadav having vast corporate exposure started this journey with along with dedicated agile team of Software Developers, Marketing and Finance. Our object to provide smart learning systems in educational institutions at cost effective.
name: PAGONI INFOSOLUTION PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
LEGAL BABU.com is India’s leading online legal technology-driven  platform

Legal Babu provides the business solutions you need to start and run a  business, protecting intellectual property rights, taxation, obtain Govt Licenses/registrations/permits and handle a variety of other common legal matters for small businesses and corporate.

We have a very simplified way of managing business compliance's, our services help entrepreneurs save time, cost, manage complex compliance requirements at ease.
